data: All over Franche-Comté the snow had fallen for three days unceasingly, yet through it for those three days a man—a soldier—had ridden, heading his course north, for Paris.
All over Franche-Comté the snow had fallen for three days unceasingly, yet through it for those three days a man--a soldier--had ridden, heading his course north, for Paris.
